actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A resolution to refer S. 1229 entitled "A bill for the relief of Richard C. Rianhard of Bar Harbor, Maine" to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1229, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 1229 entitled "A bill for the relief of Richard C. Rianhard of Bar Harbor, Maine" to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
